summary: Werewolf banner textures, and new dawnguard banner designs specificly for people willing to make werewolf themed homes
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]NEW WEREWOLF BANNER TEXTURES[/center]
These are meant for people willing to make werewolf themed homes,

TEXTURES AVALIABLE
Dawnguard: green, red, black, blue
Howling wolf: Blue, red, black
Alpha growling: black, red, blue

HOW TO USE
1-download textures
2- place them in your data textures folder
3- Dupliate generic banner
3- once you duplicated pick yor duplicate and click edit,
4- in the texture section delete the generic one and add mine,

PERMISIONS
You can use these wherever you want as long as you credit me and link my file in your description
I'd be grateful if you added pictures of your homes to this file, so both your homes and my resources get known

credits:
I've used darkfox127's knowledge and project modularity to get these done https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79519/?
author: JockrisLatour
